programme.desc: 15 years ago, Jenar found himself in a tragic event that claimed the lives of his family. Mila, who is Jenar's older sister, is still alive after Ayu's adoption. Jenar's life changes after meeting Mirza, a man who is attracted to her.

programme.title: Mental Cintanya Siap Siap Kena Rental
programme.desc: A beautiful girl from a simple family named Nasha (Syahnaz Sadiqah). Hardworking and unassuming, Nasha works as a cleaning service in an office. One day while Nasha was working in the office, her boss Elang (Jeff Smith) passed by. For some reason, there was a misunderstanding between Nasha and Elang until they got into an argument.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 319
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Love Story The Series S2 - EP 304
programme.desc: Kendra's meeting with Maudy began with an accidental meeting at the Villa, that's where Ken first saw Maudy and immediately fell in love. At first Maudy was disturbed by Ken's presence, the horse Maudy was riding accidentally got angry and fell into the river, not long after Ken jumped to save Maudy.

programme.title: Gara Gara Gecko No Jomblo Jomblo
programme.desc: A beautiful girl (Nabila Zavira) has a phobia of lizards. That day, the girl is hit by a lizard, but she is not superstitious and will still go to Jakarta, even though her mother forbids it. But when she arrives in Jakarta, she meets a boss man (Rizky Alatas) who has a pet gecko. From there, the girl works on a roving basis while looking after Gecko. Unfortunately, when the girl looks for Gecko in the cashier's drawer, she is mistaken for a thief.

programme.desc: Pasangan kekasih berpisah tatkala lelaki yang dikasihi pergi melanjutkan pelajaran. Dia berjanji akan mengahwini pasangannya bila dia kembali. Tetapi terhalang setelah dia temui perenpuan lain.

programme.title: Gen F - EP 8
programme.desc: 12 pereka fesyen terpilih dari Malaysia, Indonesia dan Singapura akan bersaing setiap minggu untuk menghasilkan rekaan terbaik mereka.

programme.title: Jesnita - EP 12
programme.desc: Dayana bertemu Aurora dan mengajaknya berpakat untuk menjatuhkan Jesnita. Rafael bertemu Emran yang bertanyakan status misi Rafael Syafinaz memperkenalkan Zaid kepada Elly.

programme.title: Malaysian Ghost Stories S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Nusantara merupakan satu daerah yang tebal dengan semangat mistik dan alam ghaib. Setiap episod mempunyai penyelesaian yang unik bergantung kepada jenis gangguan, jenis jin dan kesan ke atas watak utama.

programme.title: Aku Bukan BIMBO - EP 1
programme.desc: Elsuraya percaya Azad adalah punca kematian ibu bapanya dalam satu kemalangan dan membenci lelaki itu yang dalam diam mencintainya. Perkara sebenar disimpan rapi oleh Azad dan sahabat baiknya, Dani Ikram.

programme.title: Rahsia Hati Perempuan - EP 17
programme.desc: Mikael, Zayn & Ilaina adalah kawan baik semenjak kecil. Ilaina dan keluarga telah berpindah ke Australia. Berputik cinta antara mereka dan siapakah Arissa?

programme.title: Unplugged Ria 2019 - EP 14
programme.desc: Persembahan artis-artis tempatan dengan gabungan lagu baru dan lama bersama hos Elly Arifin dalam membongkar rahsia di sebalik pembikinan lagu tersebut.

programme.title: Mana Bro? - EP 8
programme.desc: Program realiti yang menampilkan 2 kumpulan berentap dan mengharungi cabaran dari Tempat A ke Tempat B ke Tempat C tanpa menggunakan teknologi dan alat teknologi pintar.

programme.title: Sejuta Rasa Buat Adelia - EP 11
programme.desc: Chef Adelia terpaksa menempuh sejuta perasaan dan rasa, demi membuktikan kebolehannya untuk memasak apabila mendapat tahu lelaki yang mengkritik makanannya adalah bos barunya, Idlan.

programme.title: Ahli Bapak Bapak Club - EP 11
programme.desc: Mengisahkan 3 sahabat baik, Joe, Bob dan Nick dalam mengharungi kehidupan mereka yang penuh dugaan dan pancaroba selaku lelaki, suami dan bapa.

programme.title: Weekend Yuk! - EP 4
programme.desc: Weekend Yuk! mengeksplorasi tempat-tempat baru yang ternyata menyimpan keasyikan tersendiri untuk berlibur.

programme.title: Super Game Boy The Series - EP 5
programme.desc: Danial dan kawan-kawannya Ayu, Bob dan Nina kembali beraksi dengan gelagat mereka yang lucu dan menarik. Berjayakah misi mereka di dalam setiap episod? Jom kita saksikannya.

programme.title: Geng Mak-Mak - EP 5
programme.desc: Dahlia ni boleh ke jadi seorang ibu yang baik untuk anaknya yang baru lahir?

programme.title: Mystic Village - EP 9
programme.desc: Spekulasi yang hantu raya Pak Saad sedang mengamuk tanpa bertuan membuat semua orang kampung risau akan keselamatan mereka.

programme.title: Mystic Village - EP 10
programme.desc: Yunus hampir membongkar identiti Lukman, kembar Zakaria. Dia bercadang untuk bertindak sendiri bagi mendapatkan tanah Ismail.

programme.title: Mandatori S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Norman, seorang ‘profiler’ jenayah berbakat dipanggil untuk menyiasat sepasang mayat yang ditanam di dalam konkrit, namun Norman mendapati kebolehan profilnya hilang.

programme.title: Mandatori S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Selepas memperolehi semula kebolehannya, Norman memeriksa mayat Tan dan membentuk profil pembunuh yang digelar Carlos.

programme.title: Yuna Bintang Di Langit - EP 6
programme.desc: Ikuti Yuna meneruskan kerjayanya dalam bidang muzik di sekeliling Malaysia, Los Angeles & San Diego dengan kandungan eksklusif

programme.title: Next To Neelofa - EP 11

programme.title: Manisnya Cinta Di Cappadoccia
programme.desc: Kisah konflik Ifti Liyana yang terpaksa berdepan dengan cinta tiga lelaki iaitu Fredo, Bahkhtiar, dan Nazmi.

programme.title: Impiana S4 - EP 14
programme.desc: Kini Impiana lebih berarah kepada golongan Malaynial, dipenuhi dengan segmen yang penuh inspirasi bertujuan untuk dijadikan destinasi rujukan bagi penonton mencari idea untuk hiasan rumah mereka.

programme.title: Know My Name - EP 8

programme.title: Pung Pang Rizalman - EP 7

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: ETHIRNEECHAL THODARGIRADHU
programme.desc: Urged by her father, Janani is always a high achiever. But her marriage into a patriarchal family dashes her dream of a career. Thus begins Janani's arduous journey towards empowering her family's oppressed women to unleash their power.

programme.title: AADUKALAM
programme.desc: Sathya loves her sister like a second mother & believes compassion outweighs all riches. But, Selvanayagi, a woman of pride & privilege, worships money & social status. When their worlds collide, what trials will Sathya face in her fight for justice?

programme.title: Malli
programme.desc: Things take a momentous shift when a bold & loving village girl, Malli, crosses paths with a doting father and his 6-year-old daughter who yearns for a mother's love. Join the family's journey through the nuances of love, affection & parenthood.

programme.title: ANANDARAGAM - Serial
programme.desc: Unfortunate events force an ambitious Eashwari and a school dropout Azhagar to tie the knot. Can this odd couple turn their marriage into a happily ever after? Will Eashwari realize her IPS dream amidst life's many hardships?

programme.title: Movie - Adade Sundara - EP 1
programme.desc: A Hindu Brahmin and a Christian girl fall in love, hiding their relationship from their parents. Their secrets unravel, leading to unexpected challenges and heartfelt revelations.

programme.title: Movie - En Aaloda Seruppa Kaanom - EP 1
programme.desc: Sandhya is distraught when she loses her slippers which were a gift from her father, but Krishnan promises to find them. Meanwhile, her father gets kidnapped in Syria.

programme.title: Movie - Ishtam - EP 1
programme.desc: When Pavan realises that his friend Anjana's teacher and his widowed father were in love with each other, he resolves to reunite them.

programme.title: Movie - Bholaa Shankar - EP 1
programme.desc: Shankar a painter comes from village to visit Panduranga in Mumbai, but is shocked to see his best friend is turned into Pandu Dada, a local goon.

programme.title: Movie - Desingu Raja - EP 1
programme.desc: Idhyakani falls for Bindu Madhavi despite their families' rivalry. The lovers try to unite them, but their efforts lead to a conflict between the families.

programme.title: Movie - Sethupathi - EP 1
programme.desc: A police inspector arrests a powerful person, suspecting him of murdering a fellow officer. However, a tragic mistake threatens both his life and career.

programme.title: Movie - Vadakkupatti Ramasamy - EP 1
programme.desc: A selfish charlatan exploits his village's superstitions for profit. When his main income source is shut down, he desperately tries various ways to reopen the temple.

programme.title: Movie - Dhuruvangal Pathinaaru - EP 1
programme.desc: A police officer retires after an accident during a case investigation. Years later, he is forced to relive the past as he narrates the story to his friend's son.

programme.title: Movie - Sivalinga - EP 1
programme.desc: Raheem gets killed when he tries to save a blind man in a train. When the police close the case stating suicide, Raheem's girlfriend asks Shivalingeshwaran, a CID officer, to investigate the death.

programme.title: Movie - Abraham Ozler - EP 1
programme.desc: Revolves around the personal and professional lives of veteran cop Abraham Ozler, ACP Trichur, who at one time has to take up a serial killing case and the mysterious hunt begins.

programme.title: Movie - Ainthu Ainthu Ainthu - EP 1
programme.desc: Aravind (Bharath) loses his girl friend Liyana (Mirthika) in a car accident and he lives with her memories. But, people around him try to make him believe that he is just hallucinating and no such person existed. The rest of the story shows whether he has been hallucinating about a non-existed girl friend or if there was really one.

programme.title: Movie - Enakku Vaaitha Adimaigal - EP 1
programme.desc: Krishna, an IT professional, and the story narrates the two phases of his life - the first when he falls in love, and the second after his break-up.

programme.title: Movie - Kaapa - EP 1
programme.desc: Anand fights to clear his wife's name from the KAAPA list, facing dangerous gangsters and a brutal conflict. Can he prove her innocence and survive the deadly consequences?

programme.title: Movie - Danny - EP 1
programme.desc: Police inspector Kunthavai teams up with Danny, a clever police dog, to solve a murder mystery involving a dangerous gang of serial killers in this thrilling investigation.

programme.title: Movie - Kavan - EP 1
programme.desc: A reporter and his girlfriend team up with young social activists to fight a factory whose chemical emissions are harming a village.

programme.title: Movie - Vinodhaya Sitham - EP 1
programme.desc: The smooth life of Thambi Ramiah undergoes drastic change, after his death and resurrection. At his request, 'the time' gave him extension for 3 months, to mend his affairs. Whether he was able to do it?

programme.title: Movie - Taana - EP 1
programme.desc: A young man dreams of becoming a police officer but faces a major obstacle: a disorder that alters his voice when nervous. Despite the challenges, he is determined to succeed.

programme.title: Movie - Kather Basha Endra Muthuramalingam - EP 1
programme.desc: Nana, a powerful gangster, vies for control of a village. However, Kathar, an honest man, strives for peace, resulting in a clash between the two.

programme.title: Movie - Rathnam - EP 1
programme.desc: Rathnam works as a henchman under MLA Panner Selvam. A girl travels to Vellore for an interview and a few rowdies try to kill her but Rathnam saves her and becomes her guardian angel. How long can he protect her?

programme.title: Movie - Game Changer - EP 1
programme.desc: Ram Nandan, a government official, embarks on a relentless fight against corrupt politicians. Determined to bring about fair elections, he tries to revolutionise the way the government operates.

programme.title: Movie - Ammani - EP 1
programme.desc: A bond is forged between an aged ragpicker and a middle-aged woman.

programme.title: Movie - Samsaram Adhu Minsaram
programme.desc: Ammaiyappan Mudaliar fulfils every need of his four children. However, when the eldest son fights with him and leaves the house, Uma, the daughter-in-law, tries to solve their issues.

programme.title: Movie - Bose
programme.desc: Bose, a commando, gets recruited as the security head for a minister after he rescues him from kidnappers. His life takes a turn when he shoots at the same minister for molesting a girl.

programme.title: Movie - Thirumbi Paar
programme.desc: Avuthu Nayagam, a wealthy politician, remarries Vasantha, a cunning woman. She creates problems in her stepson Veeraiyan's life and tries to grab the land from the villagers at meagre rates.

programme.desc: Thambi Oorukku Pudhusu stars Anandaraj Selvaraj and Yuvarani Ravindra.

programme.title: Movie - Parthal Pasu

programme.title: Movie - Kundakka Mandakka
programme.desc: Ilango aspires to get his sister married to a millionaire. For this, he tries his best to find a rich suitor, but ultimately realises that money is not everything and lets her marry the one she loves.

programme.title: Movie - En Aasa Raasave
programme.desc: When a young boy who works as a street dancer finds out that his mother is alive, he decides to locate her, and struggles to reunite his separated parents.

programme.title: Movie - Ezhaiyin Sirippil

programme.title: Movie - Darbar
programme.desc: Aaditya, the commissioner of Mumbai Police, sets out to catch Ajay, a drug peddler. However, he uncovers a deeper controversy linked to an international drug lord and must mete out justice.

programme.title: Movie - Kadhal Alai
programme.desc: Uday, a rich businessman, falls in love with a simple girl named Sandhya. He gets to know that Sandhya is terminally ill, but still pursues her and teaches her to seize every moment of her short life.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The German Open is a professional tennis tournament played on outdoor grass courts at the Rot-Weiss Tennis Club in Berlin, Germany. 2025 will be the 98th edition. programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 52
programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. With insight from icons on both sides-Ian Rush, Lou Macari, Brian Kidd, Michael Owen, Phil Thompson, and new Liverpool boss Arne Slot, we unpack the moments that have defined generations, split families, and lit up the Premier League.

programme.desc: From free kicks to bicycle kicks, relive some of the most memorable strikes from 2024/25 in a Premier League season.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 34
programme.desc: A product of Barcelona's famed La Masia youth academy, Cesc Fabregas is rightly remembered as one of the greatest midfield players of his generation. After making his Arsenal debut at just 16 years of age the diminutive Spaniard would go on to win titles in both England and Spain as well as becoming a World Cup winner in 2010. Now taking his first steps into coaching with Como 1907, Fabregas reflects on his footballing education as well as his hopes for the future in management.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 3
programme.desc: We celebrate the greatest goalscorers in Premier League history; the icons whose instinct, power, and flair have lit up stadiums and etched their names into footballing folklore. From Alan Shearer's relentless consistency to Thierry Henry's elegance, Sergio Aguero's killer instinct to Harry Kane's rise, we relive the moments that defined an era.

programme.desc: Nicolas Jackson has been involved in 13 goals in his last 13 Premier League games for Chelsea (9 goals, 4 assists), one more than he'd managed in his first 27 appearances (9 goals, 3 assists).

programme.title: Manchester City vs Fulham (MW07) - EP 65
programme.desc: Manchester City have won each of their last 16 meetings with Fulham in all competitions, the longest winning run one English league side has had against another in history.

programme.title: WCCB Dina Thorslund vs. April Adams
programme.desc: WBO Super Bantamweight World Champion Dina Thorslund brings her undefeated record into a defense of her title against Australian April Adams, from the Forum in Thorslun's home of Denmark. Thorslund arrives with a record of 13-0, including a near-shutout decision victory over Jessica Munoz less than a year earlier to claim the World Championship. Adams has won seven fights in a row, climbing into the top 10 rankings and title contention.

programme.title: WCCB Marco Huck vs. Ola Afolabi I
programme.desc: We look back to the beginning of the historic years-long rivalry between Marco Huck and Ola Afolabi, which began in Ludwigsburg, Germany with Huck putting his WBO Cruiserweight World Championship on the line for the first time. The result would be a closely fought, all-action contest that would lead to three more meetings between the two cruiserweights for years to come. Don't miss the kick off to the Huck vs. Afolabi rivalry for the WBO Cruiserweight World Title on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Shane Mosley vs. Manuel Gomez
programme.desc: In this episode, the newly crowned IBF Lightweight World Champion, Shane Mosley, makes the first defense of the title he claimed from Phillip Holiday just three months earlier. He would face a tough competitor in Manuel Gomez of Laredo, Mexico, who would give the new champion a difficult test.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Keith Thurman vs Orlando Lora
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the undefeated Keith Thurman facing off with Orlando Lora. A left hook and right uppercut combination ends this fight. Also on the card, action from former heavyweight champion James Kirkland.

programme.desc: Fukuoka, Japan welcomes the top talent in the world of martial arts when Karate 1 Premier League returns. programme.desc: Coming off a tremendous amateur career where he captured Gold Medals in the World Championships and European Championships, Olympian Artur Beterbiev takes a big step up in competition in just his 6th pro fight, taking on former IBF Light Heavyweight World Champion Tavoris Cloud. programme.title: Introducing:
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS Presents 'Introducing:', a new original documentary series that covers the current stars of today and rising stars of tomorrow. programme.desc: Dipsy and Laa-Laa drive to the Hidey Hup in the Tubby Car. They meet Tinky Winky and Po and the Teletubbies go on the Tubby Uppy Downy together.

programme.desc: It's Pop Paper City Sports Day and Mae-Mae is the Sports Day judge, but can she decide on the right winner?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 38
programme.desc: When Messy breaks the lighthouse, things get shady. But without a shadow of a doubt, he and his friends save the day!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 31
programme.desc: When mum's sister Brandy comes over for a visit, she brings the kids onesies as a present, which has an unexpected effect on Bingo.

programme.desc: Bingo finds a toy turtle at the playground and wants to take him home, but Dad says it's not the right thing to do.

programme.desc: The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.desc: The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.desc: Betty recalls the first time she pushed the red button, the Squirrels explore a range of emotions with Happy, Angry Bull tells a not-so-sleepy bedtime story, and the gerbils sing.

programme.desc: Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.desc: Mum, Dad, and Bingo must complete both their classes to pass swim school, but pleasing strict Big Fish instructor Margaret (aka Bluey) is proving to be very difficult.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 32
programme.desc: Bluey is the ringmaster in a game of circus with her friends, but Hercules wants to play his motorcycle game instead. Luckily, Bluey has a solution to keep everyone happy.

programme.desc: Andy heads to the Atlantic Ocean near Florida in search of bottlenose dolphins.

programme.desc: This episode features the jaguar and the anaconda. Their wild connection is is they are surprising swimmers.

programme.desc: Sandy and Seaweed have invented a new game knocking down bottles with coconuts; they have called it 'Bowling'.

programme.desc: Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the things trees do for creatures around them.

programme.desc: Duggee takes the Squirrels and their parents on an exciting mystery trip.

programme.desc: Time's a-ticking when a seller brings a Mr. T wall clock to the shop. Will Rick and Corey see gold, or will they pity the fool? Rick checks out James Bond's credit card from the 2006 movie "Casino Royale".

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S1) - EP 1

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S16) - EP 244

programme.title: ABC Late News (2025) - EP 122
programme.desc: Follow the latest on today's news, covering what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow in Perth.

programme.title: The Business (2025) - EP 84
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, investors, employees and businesses big and small. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo S4 - EP 3
programme.desc: Ernie cruises the ancient waterways of Danggu Gorge, Aaron catches up with a talented woodcarver in Queensland's sugarcane country and Narelda tries her hand at natural horsemanship in regional Victoria.

programme.title: Fancy Fruit S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Have you eaten a persimmon? If you haven't, you're not alone. And it's a sometimes-misunderstood fruit. Where better to go to learn that a Queensland orchard celebrating a record crop.

programme.title: Extraordinary Animals S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: For this group of animals, being devoted means that they are putting the lives of their offspring first - showing surprising tenderness and often going to extreme lengths to ensure their survival.

programme.title: How Deadly World S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Nature nerd, Dr Ann Jones, explains the sometimes terrifying and often hilarious behaviour of the world's most dangerous water animal.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw S5 - EP 54
programme.desc: It's salsa party time! Joining Adam is taco aficionado Daniella Guevara Munoz and homewares and hospitality connoisseur Kylie Javier Ashton.

programme.title: The World (2025) - EP 96
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast (2025) - EP 123
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. James Glenday and Emma Rebellato present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories plus Catherine Murphy with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2025) - EP 123
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Dan Bourchier.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2025) - EP 123
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia S36 - EP 16
programme.desc: Millie, Costa and Sophie answer a range of gardening questions, Millie goes behind the scenes to see how the show waste is recycled and Costa looks at the history of the Carlton Gardens site and the Royal Exhibition Building.

programme.title: Great Australian Walks S1 - EP 3

programme.title: Mad Money 20th Anniversary
programme.desc: Jim Cramer's "Mad Money" celebrates 20 years on air at CNBC.

programme.title: Unlocked
programme.desc: CNBC's Unlocked takes an inside look at how much people spend on housing, what they get for their money and what they've had to sacrifice to turn their real estate dreams into reality.

programme.title: Unlocked
programme.desc: CNBC's Unlocked takes an inside look at how much people spend on housing, what they get for their money and what they've had to sacrifice to turn their real estate dreams into reality.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: "American Greed" goes inside the dark side of the American Dream - where money seduces, power corrupts, and smooth criminals will stop at nothing to get rich. Their complex scams leave victim's lives in shambles. Each episode is a deep dive into the minds and actions of heartless crooks who live lives most people can only dream of.

programme.title: Millennial Money
programme.desc: Putting the "personal" in personal finance, get an inside look at the lives and finances of millennials. See exactly how much they earn, what they spend it on and how they invest. From starting a business to changing careers, getting in and out of debt, creating an unusual income stream, or casting it all aside to start over again... young people reveal the steps they took to make it happen.

programme.title: Access Middle East
programme.desc: Access Middle East is your window into Middle East power, money, and influence. With exclusive interviews and high-level analysis, the program brings viewers closer to the decision-makers deploying capital and driving innovation in one of the world’s most dynamic regions.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as major European financial centres take the reins of global markets. Get the first indication of how markets in Europe will react to an active Asian session and the handover from the US. With breaking news, key earnings and data, as well as interviews with market makers and C-Suite executives from across the globe, Europe Early Edition is essential viewing to be prepared for the day’s session.

programme.title: Squawk Box Europe
programme.desc: It’s one hour until the opening bell in Europe and Squawk Box Europe has everything you need to prepare for the first trade. Steve Sedgwick, Karen Tso and Julianna Tatelbaum take on the most complex stories of the day with instant analysis on how you can make your money work around the news.

programme.title: Worldwide Exchange
programme.desc: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBC’s "Worldwide Exchange" delivers essential, actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation. Anchored by Frank Holland, the program prepares CNBC’s worldwide audience with a smart take on overnight U.S. news and live international market action.

programme.title: US Squawk Box
programme.desc: "Squawk Box" is the ultimate pre-market morning news and talk program, where the biggest names in business and politics tell their most important stories. programme.title: Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, "Squawk On The Street" tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. The show also covers the final hour of European trading, providing investors with actionable insight on the best course of action to take in U.S. based markets.

programme.title: Next in Sports

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: How Formula One Finally Hooked America. Not so long ago it was the circuits of Monaco and Monza that epitomized Formula 1. Its modern ambitions, however, are more Miami.

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: How to Build a Brand New Sport. Despite Teqball being relatively unknown, the sport's creators have big plans for it. Can you build any game into a mainstream sport if you have the will and the money?

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: The American Cornhole League wants to transform cornhole from Americana staple to worldwide phenomenon.

programme.title: Next in Sports S1 - EP 6

programme.title: The Deal S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly sit with tennis champions Billie Jean King and Ilana Kloss to discuss the current buzz around women's sports and hear how they helped grow professional women's hockey.

programme.title: The Deal S2 - EP 6

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 1

programme.desc: Scientists and entrepreneurs are testing radical ideas like solar radiation management and ocean fertilisation - and finding funding for it.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 5

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.desc: Outsider artists are gaining recognition around the world. Although they create mainly for themselves, others have taken notice. See how these artists live and work.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news from Tokyo.

programme.title: Exploring Factories
programme.desc: An entertainment program visiting small and large factories to discover the latest science, hidden artisanship, and enthusiastic people that support traditions of Japanese manufacture.

programme.title: Fun with Okinawa Dialects
programme.desc: Get familiar with Okinawa dialects by listening to folk tales and children's songs.

programme.title: Drama Serial "Anpan" Week 12 (R)
programme.desc: This is a story based on the lives of Yanase Takashi (Kitamura Takumi), the creator of "Anpanman," a famous Japanese anime character, and his wife Nobu (Imada Mio). It depicts how two individuals overcame countless hardships to create "Anpanman," embodying the idea of 'justice that never wavers,' and inspiring love and courage that make the joy of living well up from within.

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: Historical Drama "UNBOUND" Eps. 23 (R)
programme.desc: With his kyoka, Nanpo's name becomes known throughout Edo, and "Hama no Kisago", a kyoka guidebook produced by Tsutaju, is flying off the shelves along with other books. Koshodo quickly rises to prominence as one of the most talked-about bookstores in Edo, and Tsutaju earns a reputation as the city's most discerning connoisseur. Around this time, he is encouraged by Suwaraya to expand into Nihonbashi.

programme.title: Special Drama "Amagi Pass"
programme.desc: A 30-year-old unsolved mystery reignites a fierce confrontation between a relentless veteran police detective Tajima (Kishitani Goro) and Mochizuki Jiro (Hagiwara Masato), a man who has erased the truth from his memory. This is the essence of a Matsumoto Seicho mystery-where human love, sin, and fate converge into a grand tragedy!

programme.title: PythagoraSwitch
programme.desc: There are various interesting laws and rules and philosophies hidden in our daily lives. This program introduces children to them and how to think.

programme.title: Backpacker Nakano Taiga in Morocco (R)
programme.desc: Nakano Taiga, the lead actor in the 2026 NHK Historical drama, set off on a journey through Morocco. An avid backpacker, Nakano has traveled extensively around the world. For this trip, too, he was determined to choose every meal and accommodation himself. From the port city of Tangier to the vast Sahara Desert, what awaited him on a journey where nothing was scripted and everything was free?

programme.title: Yokomizo Seishi Short Stories IV: Kindaichi Kosuke Part 2 (R)
programme.desc: Starring Ikematsu Sousuke, this short drama series "faithfully" visualizes Yokomizo Seishi’s masterpiece novel, in which Great detective Kindaichi Kosuke brilliantly solves cases.

programme.title: Peek-a-boo Wan Wan Wonderland
programme.desc: Enjoy the stage of "Peek-a boo" held in all over the country.

programme.title: Songs for Everyone (R)
programme.desc: A song program where children can sing along by reading the lyrics on the screen.

programme.title: With Mother
programme.desc: This children's program includes a puppet show, cartoon, music, and gymnastics in which children can participate.

programme.title: 1-Minute Anime: Songs for SDGs
programme.desc: Let's learn about SDGs while singing along! A selected goal out of 17 will be introduced in each one-minute song with animation.

programme.title: News (B)
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news from Tokyo.

programme.title: Tokoro-san's Pursuit of Truth
programme.desc: An informational program that reveals Japan as it is by following incidents posted on local media such as local newspapers and business presses.

programme.title: Fun with Japanese (R)
programme.desc: Each episode focuses on a word as a theme, exploring its meaning and history while discovering the charm of Japanese language. The program also features dance performances of quotes from the world’s great figures, visits schools to interact with children, and introduces classical performing arts and songs, making it enjoyable for both children and adults.

programme.title: Let's Enjoy English and Meets the World (R)
programme.desc: Children search for wonders worldwide and challenge themselves to communicate with foreigners in English through puppet shows, games, animation, and more. Have fun and learn English naturally with a witch, Kyary Pamyu Pamyu!

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: NHK News 7 (B)
programme.desc: NHK's core news program wrapping up the day's events in an easy to understand way.

programme.title: Strolling with Tamori
programme.desc: Comedian Tamori takes you on a tour across the country to offer a glimpse of history hidden in modern scenes.

programme.title: Project X: The Challengers-New Beginnings "Godzilla and the 35 Pirates"
programme.desc: Project X returns for the first time in 18 years. The former series featured people involved in project related to the Japanese industry and contemporary history. The new series focuses on people in the "Lost Era" following the collapse of the bubble economy. In every era, there are always those take on challenges. Even without receiving praise or being in the spotlight, some dedicate themselves to their work. The documentary delivers passion and courage right to you.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: Hello! NHK WORLD-JAPAN (R)
programme.desc: Showcasing various programs and activities of NHK WORLD-JAPAN which provides the latest information on Japan and Asia to the global audience.

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: Saturday Watch 9 (B)
programme.desc: A Saturday night show presents the latest news on domestic and foreign affairs with reliable coverage and innovative presentation.

programme.title: Saturday Drama "I Would Rather Die Alone" Eps. 1（New）
programme.desc: Yamaguchi Narumi (Ayase Haruka) enjoys her single life. However, the solitary death of her admired aunt, a dedicated career woman, compels her to hastily pursue marriage-only to fail. Even her younger colleague, Nasuda Yuya (Sano Hayato), dismisses the idea that marriage equals security as an outdated notion. This prompts Narumi to make a drastic shift from "marriage hunting" to desperately exploring "end-of-life planning."

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: Venue101
programme.desc: This live entertainment show delivers the latest music performances and information, and also connects with the audience making full use of social media.

programme.title: Premium Drama "A Distant Cry from Spring" Eps. 4（Final）Encore
programme.desc: One stormy night, a man named Kosaku (Abe Hiroshi) pays a visit to Tamiko (Tokiwa Takako), a dairy farmer in Nakashibetsu, surrounded by the magnificent nature of eastern Hokkaido. Kosaku is suspicious of the people around Tamiko, but he deftly helps out on Tamiko's farm, which is in need of help. Tamiko's young son Takeshi (Sato Yutaro), who has been living a lonely life since his father's death, takes to Kosaku, Tamiko comes to trust him deeply.

programme.title: In-Depth News Seminar "Tips for Recent Graduates: Money and Job"
programme.desc: In the age of turmoil, when situations change rapidly and information is overflowing, this commentary program will help you learn about current news topics more deeply, in which the commentators who engage in news gathering activities answer all kinds of your questions and get to the heart of the news.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Lunchtime for the Taiko Drum Performance
programme.desc: We visit Sado in Niigata to meet a renowned taiko drum performance group - their meals prepared by three dedicated women are infused with the unique flavours of Sado and include local wild plants.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Today's Close-Up
programme.desc: The market for non-alcoholic drinks is growing in Japan - from clinics to pairing menus, we look at various initiatives that are encouraging people to rethink their relationship with alcohol.

programme.title: Newsroom Tokyo
programme.desc: This programme gives you comprehensive coverage of events in Japan and Asia, explaining the day's developments and what is behind them.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Mishiro Kenshi creates installations with ornate bamboo lanterns known as 'take-akari' - he talks about the potential of the craft including his work to bring light to disaster-stricken communities.

programme.title: Japan Delish 5min.
programme.desc: Crisp, hot, and delicious Japanese gyoza - how did gyoza come to be so beloved in Japan? Taste the delicious truth for yourself!

programme.title: On the Wings 5min.
programme.desc: Hop on from Narita - the air gateway to Japan - as breathtaking window views await flying above active volcanoes!

programme.title: Ukiyo-e Edo-Life
programme.desc: Doodles or Ukiyo-e: A series of doodles by famous artist Utagawa Kuniyoshi turn out to be carefully considered depictions of the kabuki actors of the day; what kind of statement was he trying to make?

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: With colourful pile fabric and comfortable knits, Wakayama Prefecture is drawing global attention as a textile hub - we bring you striking images of its machines and the beat of its factories.

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode takes a close look at artist Utamaro's iconic "Woman with a Glass Noisemaker."

programme.title: The Seasons of Yamato
programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with pianist Mine Kawakami - for which she plays exclusive pieces - helps you experience each season.

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: Japanese stationery is famous for its quality, design and functionality - we look at many unique items including products for research labs, left-handed users, and even writing in virtual space.

programme.title: Paws of Love
programme.desc: This programme centres on the special bond between humans and their pets, highlighting heartwarming stories, practical pet care tips, and the growing pet culture in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Le Grand Tour de Liverpool
programme.desc: TVB Jade brings you endless entertainment with concurrent dramas and sitcoms, as well as the latest news, variety and infotainment programmes from TVB.

programme.title: Ink Side Story
programme.desc: Be it tattoo artists or tattoo customers, each tattoo pattern may have a world of its own. This programme visits different tattoo shops, interviews tattoo masters and customers, explores the flourishing tattoo techniques, and listens to the wonderful life stories of "tattooists".

programme.title: JSG Billboard 2025
programme.desc: Count down to the top 20 songs on JSG Billboard every episode!

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: A round-up of the news before the day ends.

programme.title: Fancy But Not Pricey
programme.desc: Led by renowned chef Christian Yang, we visit the origins of various French ingredients and show you how to pay attention to product labels, so that you can get your favourite ingredients at a bargain, helping you to create a taste that's "Fancy But Not Pricey!"

programme.title: Sword and Fairy 1 - EP 39
programme.desc: Adapted from game Chinese Paladin, the story follows Li Xiaoyao (He Yu), a waiter with hero dreams, and Zhao Ling'er (Yang Yutong), a descendant of Nuwa. They face challenges in search of the Spirit Pearl, courageously embark on a journey to save the world.

programme.title: Cleaning Up - EP 16
programme.desc: It revolves around cleaners, Eo Yong-Mi, An In-Kyung and Maeng Su-Ja, who are eager to change their destinies having overheard insider trading information at their company.

programme.title: The Escape of the Seven - EP 6
programme.desc: The 7 individuals were all involved in the heated case of a missing girl. As they attempt to escape their fate and pursue the truth, they find themselves embroiled in secrets, lies, and desires in this retribution tale.

programme.title: Trimming Success - EP 19
programme.desc: FAN TIN-LONG JASON (CHENG, KEVIN) has recently broken up with his girlfriend KO CHEUK-KEI CHOCO (CHAN MAN CHI, SHARON). As his father FAN KWONG-WING GEORGE (LAU DAN) falls ill suddenly, LONG, now single again, decides to move back to his old home in Stanley._x000D__x000D_There LONG meets his childhood friend PANG CHING (CHAN CHUNG LING, NADIA) again, who has now become a windsurfing trainer and a mechanical engineer.

programme.title: Fly With Me - EP 18
programme.desc: LEUNG HAU-CHI (Choi Siu Fun, Ada), a career woman in her 30s, has all the attributes of a typical Hong Kong girl - fussy, arrogant and easily irritated by the sight of beautiful young ladies. She is desperate for love and has been eagerly waiting for the thrilling miracles of life. As CHI is plunged into misery and despair, something strange happens and leads to her abrupt transformation into a superwoman of charm and immense strength.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 6
programme.desc: A "doppelgangers" website has facilitated the connection between two complete strangers that look like identical twins. Law firm partner Ko Sau-shing (Joe Ma) tracks down his former lover Yu Fung (Roxanne Tong), whom he has not contacted for ages, online, and Yu Fung is looking for a part-time boyfriend with a similar appearance to him. Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Men Don't Cry - EP 15
programme.desc: TVB’s across century billion-dollar production shows you the legend of a property giant._x000D__x000D_The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities.

programme.title: Wong Fei Hung - Master Of Kung Fu - EP 21
programme.desc: WONG FEI HUNG (WONG CHUNG CHAK, BOSCO) represents justice. His sayings and behavior in his youth already tell the world that he would rise to fame one day._x000D__x000D_ After his mother’s death, HUNG follows his father WONG KEI YING (KEUNG TAI WAI), whose nickname is "Guangdong Tiger", to earn a living by performing Kung Fu. After many years, they return to their home village in Foshan. HUNG’s heroic nature attracts MOK KWAI LAN (LI CHOI WA, RAIN) and they become lovers.

programme.title: Wong Fei Hung - Master Of Kung Fu - EP 22

Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Men Don't Cry - EP 16
programme.desc: TVB’s across century billion-dollar production shows you the legend of a property giant._x000D__x000D_The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities.

programme.title: Wong Fei Hung - Master Of Kung Fu - EP 23
programme.desc: WONG FEI HUNG (WONG CHUNG CHAK, BOSCO) represents justice. His sayings and behavior in his youth already tell the world that he would rise to fame one day._x000D__x000D_ After his mother’s death, HUNG follows his father WONG KEI YING (KEUNG TAI WAI), whose nickname is "Guangdong Tiger", to earn a living by performing Kung Fu. After many years, they return to their home village in Foshan. HUNG’s heroic nature attracts MOK KWAI LAN (LI CHOI WA, RAIN) and they become lovers.

programme.title: Wong Fei Hung - Master Of Kung Fu - EP 24
programme.desc: WONG FEI HUNG (WONG CHUNG CHAK, BOSCO) represents justice. His sayings and behavior in his youth already tell the world that he would rise to fame one day._x000D__x000D_ After his mother’s death, HUNG follows his father WONG KEI YING (KEUNG TAI WAI), whose nickname is "Guangdong Tiger", to earn a living by performing Kung Fu. After many years, they return to their home village in Foshan. HUNG’s heroic nature attracts MOK KWAI LAN (LI CHOI WA, RAIN) and they become lovers.

programme.title: Trimming Success - EP 20
programme.desc: FAN TIN-LONG JASON (CHENG, KEVIN) has recently broken up with his girlfriend KO CHEUK-KEI CHOCO (CHAN MAN CHI, SHARON). As his father FAN KWONG-WING GEORGE (LAU DAN) falls ill suddenly, LONG, now single again, decides to move back to his old home in Stanley._x000D__x000D_There LONG meets his childhood friend PANG CHING (CHAN CHUNG LING, NADIA) again, who has now become a windsurfing trainer and a mechanical engineer.

programme.title: Fly With Me - EP 19
programme.desc: LEUNG HAU-CHI (Choi Siu Fun, Ada), a career woman in her 30s, has all the attributes of a typical Hong Kong girl - fussy, arrogant and easily irritated by the sight of beautiful young ladies. She is desperate for love and has been eagerly waiting for the thrilling miracles of life. As CHI is plunged into misery and despair, something strange happens and leads to her abrupt transformation into a superwoman of charm and immense strength.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 6

programme.desc: WONG FEI HUNG (WONG CHUNG CHAK, BOSCO) represents justice. After many years, they return to their home village in Foshan. HUNG’s heroic nature attracts MOK KWAI LAN (LI CHOI WA, RAIN) and they become lovers.

programme.title: Young Charioteers - EP 4
programme.desc: At high school, YAU TAT (Him Law) and YIP FAI-TING (Sammy Sum) became good friends during a cycling race, but FAI-TING returned to Taiwan due to a family emergency. The two have lost contact with each other until one day they reunite at an accounting firm. TAT's supervisor LING HEI (Lin Xiawei) often manipulates office politics and sows discord amongst colleagues, making TAT and FAI-TING bear a grudge against each other.

programme.title: My Lover From The Planet Meow - EP 30
programme.desc: MIU MIU-MIU (Kristal Tin), originally from the Planet Meow, applies to live on Earth in a humanoid form to help solve the growing marriage problems between a physicist named SIT DING-KAP (Moses Chan) and CHIU YIU (Nancy Wu) so as to avoid the negative effects on her young master, SIT SZE-SZE (Celine Yeung). It turns out that, ten years ago, MIU-MIU took the appearance of a cat to be the pet of SIT's family and established a close bond with them.

programme.title: Confidant, The - EP 11
programme.desc: Owing to the destitution during their youth, LI LIAN-YING (Lai Yiu Cheung) and AN DE-HAI (Raymond Cho) have presented themselves as eunuchs in the court, where they serve their apprenticeship with an old eunuch LAU DOR-SANG (Chung King Fai). Having closely bonded to one another, the two respectively played dominant roles during the rule of Empress Dowager CIXI (Michelle Yim).

programme.title: Confidant, The - EP 12
programme.desc: Owing to the destitution during their youth, LI LIAN-YING (Lai Yiu Cheung) and AN DE-HAI (Raymond Cho) have presented themselves as eunuchs in the court, where they serve their apprenticeship with an old eunuch LAU DOR-SANG (Chung King Fai). Having closely bonded to one another, the two respectively played dominant roles during the rule of Empress Dowager CIXI (Michelle Yim).

programme.title: SAFE GUARDS - EP 18
programme.desc: The Wui Yau Safety Service is very renowned during the mid Qing Dynasty. It earns respects from officials, businessmen and triads across the country. Although it appears to be a strong company, its business is dying. The new head SHEUNG CHI (MA CHUN WAI, STEVEN) decides to reform it._x000D__x000D_ CHI is the adopted son of the family. His background and aggressive reform cause disputes at Wui Yau.

programme.title: SAFE GUARDS - EP 19
programme.desc: The Wui Yau Safety Service is very renowned during the mid Qing Dynasty. It earns respects from officials, businessmen and triads across the country. Although it appears to be a strong company, its business is dying. The new head SHEUNG CHI (MA CHUN WAI, STEVEN) decides to reform it._x000D__x000D_ CHI is the adopted son of the family. His background and aggressive reform cause disputes at Wui Yau.

programme.title: The Truth
programme.desc: Orphaned lawyer Raymond Lau once helped clear hooker Lan of murder charges, not knowing that Lan is his mother. When a corrupt cop blackmails Lan with Raymond's identity, she kills him out of desperation. When Raymond is enlisted again to defend Lan, he uncovers the secret that she has been hiding about their relationship for years.

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Li's path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair II
programme.desc: After being betrayed by Zhuo, the white-haired witch Lian seeks revenge by slaughtering her way through the eight martial arts clans. However, she is soon attacked by a man whose bride she has abducted. Meanwhile, Zhuo, who is waiting on a hilltop for a flower to bloom for Lian's restoration, hastens to save her upon realizing the danger she is in.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddy's career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation...

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the "Gang of Five" in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Model from Hell
programme.desc: Anna, an exceptional student in a modelling school, becomes the target of envy from fellow models, who all die mysteriously when they want to harm her. It turns out that when Anna is upset, she undergoes a terrifying transformation and can wield lethal psychic power...

programme.title: Law Or Justice
programme.desc: Lawyer Yip defends a rapist and gets him acquitted. Yip's boyfriend Fong, a police inspector, knows he is guilty and despises Yip for not upholding justice. The victim's sister takes revenge by spiking the rapist's drink but is raped instead. This puts the rapist back in court. Will Yip choose to uphold law or justice this time?

programme.title: The Myth
programme.desc: An archaeologist Jack, and a scientist William, stumble upon ancient Qin Dynasty artifacts that lead them to the mausoleum and mysteriously connects Jack to his past life as a warrior in ancient China, starting their mythical journey.

programme.title: The Phantom Lover
programme.desc: In 1926 China, Sung, a talented singer, is deeply in love with To, a sweet innocent girl from a wealthy family. Their love evokes strong disapproval from To's father and bitter jealousy from her designated fiance, a young man chosen by her family. This is a story about a singer and a wealthy girl battling to be together in a traditional community.

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manila's Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: Everlasting Love
programme.desc: Young intern doctor Eric meets Pei Jun and quickly falls in love with her, unaware that she works as a hostess in a night club. Despite their social differences, can their love story defy the odds and lead to a happily ever after?

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh II
programme.desc: Bodyguard Ah Sun is sent to protect his boss' son, only to meet and fall in love with his mistress, the gorgeous Joey. As love blossoms between the two, the powerful boss finds out and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: Hong Kong Hong Kong
programme.desc: After moving to Hong Kong, illegal immigrant Mang has no choice but to live in cramped quarters with male migrants who abuse her. In order to attain Hong Kong residency and a better life, she agrees to marry a lonely old carpenter. After her marriage, Mang crosses paths again with her ex-lover, and the two develop a passionate affair...

programme.title: Everyday Is Valentine
programme.desc: OK is a serial liar who constantly bends the truth to get his way. One day, he meets his dream girl, Wonderful and pretends to be a rich man in order to win her heart. However, Wonderful has sworn that she will never love a man who lies. Can OK stop lying and win his dream girl's heart?

programme.title: Mr. Possessed
programme.desc: Riley is cursed by an evil spirit to not be able to approach any woman. When he falls in love with Siu Yu, Riley's mother decides to use her to help him vanquish the evil spirit. On their wedding night, Riley passes out after protecting Siu Yu from the attack of the evil spirit. Can the two finally break the curse?

programme.title: Women
programme.desc: Bo Yi's husband is having an affair, so Bo Yi divorces him and joins the "Happy Spinsters Club" set up by her friends. However, she soon finds out that she does not enjoy being single and while sorting out her thoughts, her repentant husband begs her forgiveness. She must now decide on what she truly wants.

programme.title: Sex Beyond The Grave
programme.desc: During World War II, a singer was raped and killed by Master Tao during her escape, with all her valuables stolen as well. Since then, the Tao's house became haunted. Years later, Master Tao's descendant sells the house to a young couple to pay off a massive gambling debt, but the couple soon discover that it is haunted by the vengeful spirit...

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 2
programme.desc: Fanny appears to be an ordinary housewife but is in fact a mahjong expert. Deeply in love with her husband, she loses to a seductive woman, Curvy, both on the mahjong table and in competing for her husband's love. With the help from her mahjong master, Fanny vows to take on Curvy in the Mahjong King tournament!

programme.title: Mr. Virgin
programme.desc: Mr. Virgin is a romantic comedy about a twenty-nine year-old man Chao Yu-ting (Alfred Chang) who has seemingly been cursed. He becomes paranoid when a Feng Shui expert tells him it will be unlucky for him to marry before the age of thirty... so comical chaos line the days up to his next birthday!

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: All's Well End's Well (Extended Version)
programme.desc: In this beloved Hong Kong comedy, the three Chang brothers living with their parents learn that love blossoms with nurture, but withers when taken for granted through haste, deceit, and selfishness. This extended version features an additional shootout scene that was omitted from the original theatrical release during Lunar New Year 2016.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 97
programme.desc: Mr Lo has three sons, Leung, Fay and Kung; and a daughter-in-law, Eliza. While they seem like a normal family, their relationships need mending. Leung and Fay play a prank on their brother Kung on his birthday by falsely claiming that he has won the lottery. This sets off a chain reaction of funny mishaps that finally brings the family together.

programme.title: My Darling Genie
programme.desc: A genie who is trapped in a Chinese oil umbrella helps an honorable young man and his uncle to deal with a covetous loan shark.

programme.title: On the Edge
programme.desc: Hai Sheng has been an undercover agent for eight years. After arresting the head of a criminal gang, he finally sheds his undercover life and resumes the life of a police officer. However, he finds his current life even tougher as he is not trusted by his colleagues, dumped by his girlfriend and pursued by criminals.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Love in a Fallen City
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name by the famous novelist Eileen Chang and directed by the equally acclaimed director Ann Hui, this romance story depicts the challenging relationship between an introverted Shanghai divorcee and a cynical Malaysian playboy during the Japanese invasion of Hong Kong in the 1940s. Will the lovers be together in the end?

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Hong Kong tycoon Ren Da Kuan takes care of his family that spans four generations, yet his three sons grapple with their own challenges. Everything changes when his daughter returns from studying in France with her friend Roberto. Roberto brings a wave of transformation to the Ren family, sparking new hope and opportunities for all.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Ma Wing Jing and his brother arrive in Shanghai to make their fortune. Befriending a powerful mobster Tam, Ma is given his nightclub when he saves Tam's life. Ma's fortune rises but he must overcome the corruption and violence to survive.

programme.title: The Flying Mr. B
programme.desc: Mr. Shi, a secondary PE teacher, accidentally takes a "super pill" invented by the science teacher and gains superpower, turning into Mr. B. He uses his superpower to help the school sports team win the championship and prevent crimes. When the triad is made aware of Mr. B's superpower, they try to gain the super pill for nefarious purposes.

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her father's underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macau's economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help...

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor is dying with no heir to succeed the throne. His brother recalls that he has an illegitimate child with a court lady years ago and palace guards are sent to search for the heir. When the Emperor's nephew hires assassins to kill the child so he can be the successor, the Swift Knight comes to the rescue...

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon's clutches.

programme.title: The Supreme Swordsman
programme.desc: After beating several famous swordsmen, Chin Wu Hsin of the Mo Shan clan challenges Supreme Swordsman to a duel, hoping to win his title, and is beaten and humiliated. The winner taunts him to find a Supreme Sword made by Old Eagle, a famous sword-maker. When his offer to buy a sword from Old Eagle, is turned down, he challenges Old Eagle to a duel, and snatches his sword in a foul play. Old Eagle's own son Shih Yen-peh vows to avenge for his father...

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: The formidable swordswoman Silver Fox was a child when her father was senselessly wounded by his step brother, and her mother raped. It is payback time eighteen years later, as her father trains her up with kung fu to take revenge on his behalf.

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his father's death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the "Toad Stance" and accidentally unveils his true identity...

programme.title: Godfather of Canton
programme.desc: A docker, Lin Si Hai, accidentally saves Commissioner Cheng who then offers him a position in the police force. Lin is smart and soon rises through the ranks through treachery and corruption, before becoming a gangster.

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus' Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: Killer Darts
programme.desc: A group of bandits raided the village where dart master Liu lives and killed his wife. While hunting them down, Liu's disciple kills a farmer and his wife when she refuses his advances, leading Liu to adopt their orphaned daughter and raises her with his son. Years later, the daughter meets a man with the bandits and is tricked to go against Liu.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Li's new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: Dragon Swamp
programme.desc: Fan is cheated by her lover Tong to steal her master's Jade Dragon Sword. She is jailed in the Dragon Swamp as punishment and gave birth to a pair of twins - her daughter is raised by her master, while her son is taken by Tong. Twenty years later, the sword is stolen again and Fan's daughter goes seeking for it, meeting Fan's friend along the way.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: The Twin Swords
programme.desc: Gui Wu and his wife Gan Lian Zhu are the famous "Twin Swords" in the martial arts world. One day, they stumble upon a kidnapping plot at the Red Lotus Temple and Lian Zhu is held captive. Wu successfully escapes to find the Gan family for help, not knowing that he is sending them into an ambush by the kidnappers. Can he finally save Lian Zhu?

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: In this classic romantic melodrama, nightclub songstress Qing Qing falls for the handsome Peng Nan. However, the two go through an emotional roller coaster of misunderstandings, separations and mutual torment. When the two finally fall back into love, Qing Qing receives a shocking revelation that brings the story to its inevitable sad ending.

programme.title: Return of the Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: One of Shaw Studio's highest grossing movies ever, this is the story of Li Chin Huan, the renowned, charming and sentimental swordsman who must fight many opponents, including an evil Clan Chief, for a place in the martial arts world.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: Finger of Doom
programme.desc: The protagonists are ex-swordmasters who now find joy in making umbrellas. They track down the evil Madame Kung Sun and her poisonous "Finger of Doom", a unique supernatural power which allows her to transform normal, everyday people into horrifying zombies, and this is just the start of their mythical adventure against this zombie maker!

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Dong and Chu plan to get married but their families who are lifelong rivals, disapproved. They decide to fake suicide and eventually get both of their parents to settle their differences and approve the marriage. Concurrently, a record company announces that they will release Dong's songs, leading to double bliss for the couple.

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperor's plot once again.

programme.title: Tales of a Eunuch
programme.desc: Tales Of A Eunuch reunites the potent mix of martial arts superstar Gordon Liu, who plays Emperor in cognito Kang Hsi, with the kung-fu comedienne Wang Yu, an anti-Ching revolutionary. It is a film laced with wild barrages of excellent martial arts chiefly choreographed by Yuen Hua and Yuan Pien; Jackie Chan's long-time kung-fu classmates. At one time, Wang was considered to be the next Alexander Fu Sheng.

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people's livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Murder Plot
programme.desc: Martial artist Shen Lang is in discussions with kung fu experts from the other six sects to plot the downfall of the traitorous Happy King when his fiancee suddenly disrupts them and Shen has to quickly bring her away. As they continue to pursue the Happy King, both Shen and his fiancee accidentally fall into a trap set up by the King.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: Twin Blades Of Doom
programme.desc: A retired martial artist is forced to return with a vengeance after his family and friends are murdered by the evil Ghost Gang. He decides to challenge the gang's leader to a deadly duel so as to take revenge. Can he defeat the ruthless leader in the end?

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: The Knight of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his army's help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her family's objection, so Hong's maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.
